1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Additional functions for pairs.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Pair
6  ( -- * Map
7    mapFst, mapSnd,
8    consFst, consSnd,
9    mapFstTo, mapSndTo,
10    -- * Either
11    right2, right3, right4,
12    -- * Monad
13    sequenceFst, sequenceSnd,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
17
18
19-- ----------------------  Map
20
21-- | Apply function to 'fst' element.
22mapFst :: (a -> c) -> (a, b) -> (c, b)
23mapFst f (x, y) = (f x, y)
24
25-- | Apply function to 'snd' element.
26mapSnd :: (b -> c) -> (a, b) -> (a, c)
27mapSnd f (x, y) = (x, f y)
28
29-- | Cons up an element to 'fst' list.
30consFst :: a -> O.Map ([a], b)
31consFst x = mapFst (x:)
32
33-- | Cons up an element to 'snd' list.
34consSnd :: b -> O.Map (a, [b])
35consSnd x = mapSnd (x:)
36
37-- | Apply function to 'fst' element in functor data.
38--
39--  >>> mapFstTo length $ Just ("aa", "bbbb")
40--  Just (2, "bbbb")
41--
42mapFstTo :: (Functor m) => (a -> c) -> m (a, b) -> m (c, b)
43mapFstTo = fmap . mapFst
44
45-- | Apply function to 'snd' element in functor data.
46--
47--  >>> mapSndTo length $ Just ("aa", "bbbb")
48--  Just ("aa", 4)
49--
50mapSndTo :: (Functor m) => (b -> c) -> m (a, b) -> m  (a, c)
51mapSndTo = fmap . fmap
52
53
54-- ----------------------  Either
55
56-- | Create right pair from either pair.
57--
58--   >>> right2 (Right 'a', Right 'b') :: Either Char (Char, Char)
59--   Right ('a','b')
60--
61--   >>> right2 (Left 'a', Right 'b') :: Either Char (Char, Char)
62--   Left 'a'
63--
64right2 :: (Either a b, Either a c) -> Either a (b, c)
65right2 (Right b, Right c) = Right (b, c)
66right2 (Left a, _) = Left a
67right2 (_, Left a) = Left a
68
69-- | Create right triple from either triple.
70right3 :: (Either a b, Either a c, Either a d) -> Either a (b, c, d)
71right3 (Right b, Right c, Right d) = Right (b, c, d)
72right3 (Left a, _, _) = Left a
73right3 (_, Left a, _) = Left a
74right3 (_, _, Left a) = Left a
75
76-- | Create right quadruple from either quadruple.
77right4 :: (Either a b, Either a c, Either a d, Either a e) -> Either a (b, c, d, e)
78right4 (Right b, Right c, Right d, Right e) = Right (b, c, d, e)
79right4 (Left a, _, _, _) = Left a
80right4 (_, Left a, _, _) = Left a
81right4 (_, _, Left a, _) = Left a
82right4 (_, _, _, Left a) = Left a
83
84
85-- ----------------------  Monad
86
87-- | Monadic sequencing of 'fst' elements.
88sequenceFst :: (Monad m) => [(m a, b)] -> m [(a, b)]
89sequenceFst xs =
90    do let (fs, ss) = unzip xs
91       fs' <- sequence fs
92       return $ zip fs' ss
93
94-- | Monadic sequencing of 'snd' elements.
95--
96--   >>> sequenceSnd [("a", Just "x"), ("b", Just "y")]
97--   Just [("a","x"), ("b","y")]
98--
99--   >>> sequenceSnd [("a", Just "x"), ("b", Nothing)]
100--   Nothing
101--
102sequenceSnd :: (Monad m) => [(a, m b)] -> m [(a, b)]
103sequenceSnd xs =
104    do let (fs, ss) = unzip xs
105       ss' <- sequence ss
106       return $ zip fs ss'
